summary.span: 命名空間提供從 Managed 程式碼對 Active Directory 網域服務的簡易存取。

span.span: The namespace provides easy access to Active Directory Domain Services from managed code.

summary.span: 命名空間包含兩個元件類別： 和 ，它們使用 Active Directory Services Interface (ADSI) 技術。

span.span: The namespace contains two component classes, and , which use the Active Directory Services Interfaces (ADSI) technology.

summary.span: ADSI 是一組 Microsoft 提供的介面，做為與多種網路提供者一起使用的彈性工具。

span.span: ADSI is the set of interfaces that Microsoft provides as a flexible tool for working with a variety of network providers.

summary.span: 不管網路的大小為何，ADSI 都可以讓系統管理員在網路上輕鬆地尋找並管理資源。

span.span: ADSI gives the administrator the ability to locate and manage resources on a network with relative ease, regardless of the size of the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空間中的類別可與任何一個 Active Directory 網域服務的服務提供者。The classes in this namespace can be used with any of the Active Directory Domain Services service providers. 目前的提供者： 網際網路資訊服務 (IIS)、 輕量型目錄存取通訊協定 (LDAP)、 Novell NetWare 目錄服務 (NDS) 和 WinNT。The current providers are: Internet Information Services (IIS), Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP), Novell NetWare Directory Service (NDS), and WinNT. ADSI 是 Microsoft Active Directory 網域服務，可讓您的應用程式使用單一介面在網路上的不同目錄互動的程式設計介面。ADSI is a programmatic interface for Microsoft Active Directory Domain Services that enables your applications to interact with diverse directories on a network using a single interface. 您可以使用 ADSI，來建立執行一般工作，例如備份資料庫、 存取印表機，以及管理使用者帳戶的應用程式。Using ADSI, you can create applications that perform common tasks, such as backing up databases, accessing printers, and administering user accounts. 它會假設您有 Active Directory 網域服務之前使用這些類別有基本認識。It is assumed that you have a general understanding of Active Directory Domain Services before using these classes. 如需有關 Active Directory 網域服務的詳細資訊，請參閱主題[Introduction to Active Directory 物件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121193&clcid=0x409)和[Active Directory 技術背景資料](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121194&clcid=0x409)，以及中的下列主題在 MSDN library [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library):For more information on Active Directory Domain Services, see the topics [Introduction to Active Directory Objects](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121193&clcid=0x409) and [Active Directory Technology Backgrounder](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121194&clcid=0x409), as well as the following topics in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library): - [使用 Active Directory 網域服務Using Active Directory Domain Services](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121195&clcid=0x409) - [Active Directory 服務介面Active Directory Service Interfaces](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121197&clcid=0x409) - [輕量型目錄存取通訊協定Lightweight Directory Access Protocol](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121198&clcid=0x409) - [實作 Active Directory 服務介面的提供者Implementing Active Directory Service Interfaces Providers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121199&clcid=0x409) - [繫結至 ADSI 物件Binding to an ADSI Object](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121200&clcid=0x409) - [IADsOpenDSObject::OpenDSObjectIADsOpenDSObject::OpenDSObject](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121201&clcid=0x409) Active Directory 網域服務會使用以樹狀結構。Active Directory Domain Services use a tree structure. 在樹狀目錄中的每個節點都包含一組屬性。Each node in the tree contains a set of properties. 您可以使用此命名空間來周遊、 搜尋，並修改樹狀目錄中，與讀取和寫入的節點屬性。Use this namespace to traverse, search, and modify the tree, and read and write to the properties of a node. 類別會封裝 Active Directory 網域服務階層架構中的節點或物件。The class encapsulates a node or object in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. 使用這個類別的繫結至物件、 讀取屬性，以及更新屬性。Use this class for binding to objects, reading properties, and updating attributes. 協助程式類別，連同提供的支援生命週期管理和瀏覽方法，包括建立、 刪除、 重新命名、 移動子節點，及列舉子系。Together with helper classes, provides support for life-cycle management and navigation methods, including creating, deleting, renaming, moving a child node, and enumerating children. 使用對 Active Directory 網域服務階層執行查詢的類別。Use the class to perform queries against the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. LDAP 是唯一系統提供 Active Directory 服務介面 (ADSI) 提供者支援搜尋。LDAP is the only system-supplied Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) provider that supports searching. 透過 Active Directory 網域服務階層的搜尋傳回的執行個體，其中包含執行個體中類別。A search of the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy through returns instances of , which are contained in an instance of the class. 注意： 許多類別、 方法和屬性在命名空間使用程式碼存取安全性選項。Note: Many of the classes, methods, and properties in the namespace use the code access security option. 這表示程式碼存取安全性要求只在 just-in-time 編譯期間發生，而且只能在呼叫組件上而不是整個呼叫堆疊執行的要求。This means that the code access security demand only occurs during just-in-time compilation and that the demand is performed only on the calling assembly and not up the entire call stack. 因為這個緣故，呼叫端不應該傳遞至不受信任的程式碼從這個命名空間，在執行階段所建立的物件。Because of this, callers should not pass objects that are created from this namespace at runtime to code that is not trusted.
